title: The Lark Ascending
description: Leeds 1919. The war is over but young Alice Fields, who hates her job in an old-fashioned shop, isnâ€™t celebrating. However, her life is about to change when a rich customer leaves behind an expensive fur stole and Alice makes great efforts to return it. Dark secrets bring not only money but misery, too. During the contrasting worlds of the roaring twenties and the General Strike, love and deep friendships bloom like poppies on the devastated battlefields over which the lark rises again.
author: Sally Zigmond
